column1: % composition of validated voters and nonvoters
Among all, say they live in ___ community
Once or twice a month/a few times a year

Notes: Validated voters are those found to have voted in any of 5 commercial voter files in November 2016 and reported voting for Trump, Clinton, Johnson or Stein. Nonvoters are those who were not found to have voted in any of the files. Corrected for questionable matches. Don’t know responses not shown.
*For items in the ideological consistency scale see The Partisan Divide on Political Values Grows Even Wider, October 5, 2017.
Source: Pew Research Center survey conducted Nov. 29-Dec. 12, 2016.
